name: ProductManagerCrossing
tag_list: product-manager-jobs, sales-product-manager-jobs, retail-product-manager-jobs, software--technical-product-manager, director-product-management, online-product-manager-jobs
overview:
In an orderly and structured fashion, we consolidate all of the product management jobs from every product management career page, company and organization career page (and every other job site we can find) so you know about all the product management jobs and can make your important personal career decisions in an objective and rational way.

We are a “good citizen” in the product management community and have high research standards and know you too have high standards for your career. As an unbiased research company with a profound respect for concrete facts and information about job openings, we are loyal to our members and do not accept any money from advertisers for job postings.

We give you the tools to follow through and pursue your career options in a stable, practical and down-to-earth manner.
